infos.value: ...What's wrong?
Do you smell that?
Smell what?
It's him... Muraga is near.
I never knew you had a nose like that.
So...what should we do? We're bound to cross paths if we continue on.
Sounds like a good time.
I've been sore that we couldn't make a bloodbath out of that Leonis lot, after all.
And what say you two?
You mean to make a fool of Muraga?
I can't think of a good reason not to, aye!
And what if they come at us in earnest?
It doesn't matter.
It was always our intention to seize the Fennes throne in the end, aye!
My, how confident.
...There they are.
Muraga and Oldoa. And...Kilphe, it seems.
And the rest aren't even worth mentioning, aye?
I call dibs on Muraga.
Then I call Kilphe.
Wait a minute. So the two of us get Oldoa and the leftover small fry?
I was hoping for more of a challenge, aye!
...Shall we?
Seems we've stumbled upon a whole school of small fry. Where might you be headed...?
Could it be that you've turned tail, fleeing for the castle?
*Sniff sniff* ...
Man, it stinks! Like a pack of beaten dogs!
S-stop that at once...
So that's it. You've been scared off by Leonis's forces.
...Huh? You mumbling something over there?
Kill, kill yer...kill.
It's so ridiculous, it's laughable. He said he's going to kill us!
And we had just gotten His Fierceness to calm down...
It's all right. You needn't restrain yourself.
Who needs a level head, am I right?
Are you four serious...?
We can't pass up an opportunity to catch some fine prey.
No hard feelings, huh?
